102     def __init__(
103         self,
104         expires_at: Optional[str] = None,
105         token_type: str = "access",
106         **kwargs,
107     ):
108         message = f"{token_type.title()} token has expired"
109         if expires_at:
110             message += f" (expired at: {expires_at})"
111 
112         super().__init__(
113             message=message,
114             code=ErrorCode.TOKEN_EXPIRED,
115             token_type=token_type,
116             severity=ErrorSeverity.MEDIUM,
117             **kwargs,
118         )
119 
120         self.with_details(
121             suggestion="Please refresh your token and try again",
122             documentation_url="https://docs.fastapi-easy.com/auth/token-refresh",
123         )
124

128 
129     def __init__(
130         self,
131         reason: Optional[str] = None,
132         token_type: str = "access",
133         **kwargs,
134     ):
135         message = f"{token_type.title()} token is invalid"
136         if reason:
137             message += f": {reason}"
138 
139         super().__init__(
140             message=message,
141             code=ErrorCode.TOKEN_INVALID,
142             token_type=token_type,
143             severity=ErrorSeverity.MEDIUM,
144             **kwargs,
145         )
146 
147         self.with_details(
148             suggestion=(
149                 "Please obtain a new valid token\n"
150                 "Common causes:\n"
151                 "- Token was tampered with\n"
152                 "- Incorrect token format\n"
153                 "- Invalid signature"
154             ),
155         )
156

160 
161     def __init__(
162         self,
163         location: Optional[str] = None,
164         token_type: str = "access",
165         **kwargs,
166     ):
167         message = f"{token_type.title()} token is required"
168         if location:
169             message += f" in {location}"
170 
171         super().__init__(
172             message=message,
173             code=ErrorCode.TOKEN_MISSING,
174             token_type=token_type,
175             severity=ErrorSeverity.LOW,
176             **kwargs,
177         )
178 
179         self.with_details(
180             suggestion=f"Please provide a valid {token_type} token",
181             documentation_url="https://docs.fastapi-easy.com/auth/token-usage",
182         )
183
